sentences.sContent: A flash of lightning heralded torrential rain.
sentences.sCn: 一道闪电预示着暴雨即将来临。

sentences.sContent: Flashing blue lights heralded the arrival of the police.
sentences.sCn: 闪烁的蓝色灯光预示警察就要到达。

words.tran: 纹章的；纹章学的；传令官的；司宗谱纹章官员的

trans.tranCn: 传达， 通告； 预示…的来临
trans.tranOther: to be a sign of something that is going to come or happen soon

trans.tranCn: 传令官；使者，报信者；先驱，前锋
trans.tranOther: someone who carried messages from a ruler in the past
